attributes.review: This app is so weird. First of all it’s all in russian which I thought was weird but to be expected. It started yelling non sensical things at me that sounded as coherent as a toddler trying to insult a Ivy League scholar. I wouldn’t download unless you want your info leaked to the Chinese and Russian governments. Sad!
attributes.title: App is weird

attributes.review: Donald Trump has horrible plans for the future of the people. He does not know how to control himself and his twitter account. Also how are we supposed to get out of the trillions of dollars in debt??? Who is going to pay it back? We are going to end up being owned by China!!
attributes.title: Bad app

attributes.review: After I downloaded the app it made my phone continuously crash. I’ve also heard stories of it sending your information to China and sure enough in the terms and conditions it does it! Worst app ever created 👎🏼
attributes.title: Continuous Crashing

attributes.review: this app is the worst thing i ever spent my time on. i was hoping to find things about ✨🧚🏻‍♂️trump✨🧚🏻‍♂️ that might make up for the fact that he’s homophobic, racist, sexist awful person. however not only did it take forever for it to download but i actually ended up finding the opposite of what i was looking for. it’s an awful set up and super hard to understand what’s even going on in the app! don’t download it unless you want to waste your time on trash.
attributes.title: awful app

attributes.review: I don’t recommend this app to anyone! When  a man popped up to to the screen , he was grossly discolored, this man was completely orange !!! Whoever created the graphics for this app did a completely awful job with the coloring! Thanks to this app, my five year old now draws orange people 😤.
attributes.title: Worst app ever!

attributes.review: i’ve had the app for about 2 weeks, and it constantly crashes. the format is messy and just not up to date. trump also promotes that global warming isn’t real... 👁😳 apple please monitor what this app is promoting. anyways don’t vote for Kanye y’all 🤢
attributes.title: horrible format & service

attributes.review: I had really high expectations for this app as Trump is our anti-racist, anti-sexist, anti-homophobic president and my personal role model😍😍After downloading the app I started getting severe pain all over my body😰😰I went to look in the mirror and my skin had turned bright ORANGE🍊🍊Please do not download for your own safety😫😫
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD 🤮🤮

attributes.review: It made my phone crash and it keeps sending me weird notifications! If I could give it 0 stars I would. also you’re just garbage in general! So thanks for this terrible app I will be deleting it. 😊❤️
attributes.title: don’t download this trash.

attributes.review: a lot of people are trying to delete this app. i just wanted to see what trump supporters do. it completely messed up my phone causing spam and i’m pretty sure it has all my information now. please don’t download
attributes.title: Horrible. Just plan SPAM

attributes.review: black lives matter. trump has done nothing for our country. the cheeto we call our president shouldn’t be president periodt. don’t get this app. don’t vote for trump. don’t vote for kanye. i’m embarrassed to live in america bc trump 🤡🤡😌save barron 2020🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸 🧚🏻💗✨ thank you for listening i hope trump supporters get educated. 🤡💗
attributes.title: ✨AWFUL✨
